department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

remark.ch: 研究所領域分類：化工類

goal.en: "The main theme of the Physical Biochemistry is discuss and explore the physical fundamental encounter in the biosystem and bioengineering system: We will emphasis the thermodynamics, kinetics and conformation of the systems interested. Students interesting in the fundamentals of bio-behavior are encouraged to take, however student should have physical chemistry background and are interested in biochemistry."
goal.ch:
"教授與探討生物系統與生物工程系統中 牽涉到的物理
主要內容為生物熱力學 生物動力學及生物結構學
修課學生須有基礎之生物學及物理化學背景 且對於生物行為之基礎與原因有興趣
修完課的同學應有能力對生物及生物工程運用等學科能有能力用基礎的物理觀念 包括熱力及動力等加以說明。授課內容如下：
Introduction: (structure, buffer, units,......) Week 1
Biological Molecules (proteins, polynucleotides, polysaccharides,
fat, lipid, water,...) Week 2
Chromatography
Spectroscopic Techniques
Mass Spectrometry
Biocalorimetry
Molecular Modeling Week 3-9
Students presentation: Week 10-11
Structure and Interactions Thermodyanmics and Structural Biology
Week 12
Kientics of Biochemistry Week 13
10. Thermodynamics of Biochemistry Week 14
6. Surface Plasmon Resonance and ITC for Thermodynamics and Kinetics discrimination Week 16
Paper review: Thermodynamic and kinetic analyses for understanding
sequence-specific DNA recognition Week 17"

2nd ed. (2006)

Pearson Education, Inc.
ISBN 0-13-046427-9"
